radiographic_examinations.findings: Bibasilar atelectasis, dilated appendix up to 1.3 cm with hyperemic and thickened walls and periappendiceal stranding, pancreatic duct dilated up to 8 mm in the head, numerous bilateral renal hypodensities, exophytic lesion at the right inferior pole measuring 1.8 cm, and a moderate hiatal hernia.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Pancreatic duct dilated up to 8 mm in the head, new from the previous study.
